qu:Page.name: Instructions
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Dear ${USER.NAME}, in this questionnaire, we ask you assess quality and impact of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} in the four categories Individual Impact, Organizational Impact, Information Quality, and System Quality. Each category is first explained, before we ask you to complete the respective questionnaire items.

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Individual Impacts are concerned with how ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has influenced your individual performance. This section seeks to assess whether ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has helped your (e.g.) ability to interpret information accurately, understanding of information and work related activities in your agency, decision making effectiveness, and overall productivity.

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I have learnt much through the presence of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} enhances my awareness and recall of job related information.

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} enhances my effectiveness in the job.

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} increases my productivity.

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Comments

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Overall, the impact of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} on me has been positive.

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Organisational Impacts refer to impacts of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} at a broader level. Here we are interested in (e.g.): costs of organisational resources dedicated to run ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}, number of applications replaced/introduced, changes in staff requirements, and changes in business processes, due to the introduction of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is cost effective.

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has resulted in reduced staff costs.

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has resulted in cost reductions (e.g. inventory holding costs, administration expenses, etc.).

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has resulted in overall productivity improvement.

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has resulted in improved outcomes or outputs.

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has resulted in an increased capacity to manage a growing volume of activity (e.g. transactions, population growth, etc.).

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has resulted in a better positioning for business.

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has resulted in improved business processes.

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Comments

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Overall, the impact of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} on my organization has been positive.

qu:Page.name: Organizational Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Comments

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Information Quality is concerned with the quality of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} outputs: namely, the quality of the information the system produces in reports and on-screen.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} provides output that seems to be exactly what is needed.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Information needed from ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is always available.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Information from ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is in a form that is readily usable.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Information from ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is easy to understand.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Information from ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} appears readable, clear, and well-formatted.

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Information from ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is concise.

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Comments

qu:Page.name: Information Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Overall, the ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} Information Quality is satisfactory.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: System-Quality of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is a multifaceted construct designed to capture how the system performs from a technical and design perspective.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is easy to use.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is easy to learn.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} meets my community's requirements.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} includes necessary features and functions.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} always does what it should.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} user interface can be easily adapted to one's personal approach.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} requires only the minimum number of fields and screens to achieve a task.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: All data within ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is fully integrated and consistent.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} can be easily modified, corrected or improved.

qu:Page.name: System Quality
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Overall, the ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} System Quality is satisfactory.

qu:Page.name: Overall Success
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Overall, I think ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is a complete success.
